TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpCookie extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供型別安全 (Type-Safe) 方式來建立並操作個別 HTTP Cookie。

span.span: Provides a type-safe way to create and manipulate individual HTTP cookies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別取得和設定的個別 cookie 的屬性。The class gets and sets properties of individual cookies. 類別提供方法來儲存、 擷取及管理多個 cookie。The class provides methods to store, retrieve, and manage multiple cookies. ASP.NET 包含兩個內建 cookie 集合。ASP.NET includes two intrinsic cookie collections. 透過集合集合物件包含用戶端中的伺服器傳送的 cookie`Cookie`標頭。The collection accessed through the collection of the object contains cookies transmitted by the client to the server in the `Cookie` header. 透過集合集合物件包含在伺服器上建立並傳送給用戶端的新 cookie `Set-Cookie` HTTP 回應標頭。The collection accessed through the collection of the object contains new cookies created on the server and transmitted to the client in the `Set-Cookie` HTTP response header. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何檢查 cookie`DateCookieExample`中物件。The following code example demonstrates how to check for a cookie named `DateCookieExample` in the object. 如果找不到 cookie，則會建立並加入至物件。If the cookie is not found, it is created and added to the object. Cookie 會設定為在 10 分鐘後到期。The cookie is set to expire in 10 minutes. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.HttpCookie#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpCookie/cs/HttpCookie.cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.HttpCookie#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpCookie/vb/HttpCookie.vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Domain { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定與 Cookie 關聯的網域。

span.span: Gets or sets the domain to associate the cookie with.

value.span: 與 Cookie 關聯的網域名稱。

span.span: The name of the domain to associate the cookie with.
The default value is the current domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定`Domain`屬性會限制要從該網域要求資源的用戶端的 cookie 的傳輸。Setting the `Domain` attribute limits transmission of the cookie to clients requesting a resource from that domain. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定 cookie 的網域。The following code example sets the cookie's domain. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookie.Domain Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.Domain Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookie.Domain Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.Domain Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 Cookie 的到期日和時間。

span.span: Gets or sets the expiration date and time for the cookie.

value.span: Cookie 到期當天 (在用戶端的) 時間。

span.span: The time of day (on the client) at which the cookie expires.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定 cookie 的到期時間為 10 分鐘從目前的時間。The following code example sets the expiration time of the cookie to 10 minutes from the current time. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookie.Expires Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.Expires Example/CS/default.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookie.Expires Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.Expires Example/VB/default.aspx#2)]

summary.span: 取得值，指出 Cookie 是否有子索引鍵 (Subkey)。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether a cookie has subkeys.

value.span: 如果 Cookie 有子機碼 (Subkey)，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the cookie has subkeys, otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會檢查每個成員的多個值的 cookie 集合。The following code example examines each member of a cookie collection for multiple values. 如果 cookie屬性是`true`，指出有多個值，這個範例會將值名稱複製到一個字串陣列和對應的值插入另一個字串陣列。If a cookie's property is `true`, indicating that multiple values are present, this example copies the value names into one string array and the corresponding values into another string array. 如需如何建立 cookie 的多個值的範例，請參閱。For an example of how to create multiple values for a cookie, see . [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookie.HasKeys Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.HasKeys Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookie.HasKeys Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.HasKeys Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool HttpOnly { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定數值，指定 Cookie 是否由用戶端指令碼存取。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether a cookie is accessible by client-side script.

value.span: 如果 Cookie 有 屬性且不可以透過用戶端指令碼存取，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the cookie has the attribute and cannot be accessed through a client-side script; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本 6 的 Service Pack 1 和更新版本支援 cookie 的屬性， ，可協助減輕竊取的 cookie 會導致跨網站指令碼威脅。Microsoft Internet Explorer version 6 Service Pack 1 and later supports a cookie property, , that can help mitigate cross-site scripting threats that result in stolen cookies. Cookie 遭竊可以包含機密資訊識別使用者的站台，例如 ASP.NET 工作階段識別碼或表單驗證票證，並可用來重新執行攻擊者才能偽裝成使用者，或取得機密資訊。Stolen cookies can contain sensitive information identifying the user to the site, such as the ASP.NET session ID or forms authentication ticket, and can be replayed by the attacker in order to masquerade as the user or obtain sensitive information. 當`HttpOnly`收到相容的瀏覽器 cookie，就無法存取用戶端指令碼。When an `HttpOnly` cookie is received by a compliant browser, it is inaccessible to client-side script. > [!CAUTION] > 設定屬性`true`無法防止攻擊者存取網路通道直接存取 cookie。Setting the property to `true` does not prevent an attacker with access to the network channel from accessing the cookie directly. 請考慮使用安全通訊端層 (SSL) 可協助防止這種。Consider using Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) to help protect against this. 工作站安全性也很重要的因為惡意使用者可以使用開啟的瀏覽器視窗或包含永續性 cookie 電腦取得合法使用者的身分識別與 Web 網站的存取權。Workstation security is also important, as a malicious user could use an open browser window or a computer containing persistent cookies to obtain access to a Web site with a legitimate user's identity. 如需有關可能的攻擊，以及如何減輕這些協助此屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[Mitigating 跨網站指令碼與僅限 HTTP Cookie](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=41580)。For more information on possible attacks and how this property can help mitigate them, see [Mitigating Cross-site Scripting With HTTP-only Cookies](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=41580). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何撰寫`HttpOnly`cookie，並顯示如何不能存取用戶端透過 ECMAScript。The following code example demonstrates how to write an `HttpOnly` cookie and shows how it is not accessible by the client through ECMAScript. [!code-aspx-csharp[HttpOnlyCookie#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpOnlyCookie/CS/httponlycookiecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HttpOnlyCookie#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpOnlyCookie/vb/httponlycookievb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The key (index) of the cookie value.
Gets a shortcut to the property.

summary.span: 提供這個屬性來與 ASP 先前版本相容。

span.span: This property is provided for compatibility with previous versions of Active Server Pages (ASP).
The cookie value.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 Cookie 的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of a cookie.

value.span: 預設值為 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 為 )，除非建構函式 (Constructor) 另有指定值。

span.span: The default value is a null reference ( in Visual Basic) unless the constructor specifies otherwise.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例接收的 cookie 集合中的用戶端從`Cookie`標頭和尋找具有特定名稱的 cookie 集合中執行迴圈。The following code example receives a cookie collection from the client in the `Cookie` header and loops through the collection looking for a cookie with the specific name. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookie.Name Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.Name Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookie.Name Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.Name Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Path { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定與目前 Cookie 一起傳輸的虛擬路徑。

span.span: Gets or sets the virtual path to transmit with the current cookie.

value.span: 與 Cookie 一起傳輸的虛擬路徑。

span.span: The virtual path to transmit with the cookie.

value.span: 預設為 ，也就是伺服器根目錄。

span.span: The default is , which is the server root.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性擴充cookie 適用於特定的 URL，完整描述的屬性。The property extends the property to completely describe the specific URL to which the cookie applies. 例如，在 URL http:/ www.microsoft.com/asp，網域是 www.microsoft.com 而路徑是 /asp。For example, in the URL http:/www.microsoft.com/asp, the domain is www.microsoft.com and the path is /asp. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定新 cookie 的屬性。The following code example sets the property of a new cookie. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookie.Path Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.Path Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookie.Path Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.Path Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::SameSiteMode SameSite { System::Web::SameSiteMode get(); void set(System::Web::SameSiteMode value); };
public: property bool Secure { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否要使用 SSL (亦即，只能透過 HTTPS) 來傳輸 Cookie。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to transmit the cookie using Secure Sockets Layer (SSL)--that is, over HTTPS only.

value.span: 若要透過 SSL 連線 (HTTPS) 來傳送 Cookie，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: to transmit the cookie over an SSL connection (HTTPS); otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要設定的 cookie 整個應用程式中使用 SSL 傳輸，應用程式的組態檔，位於應用程式的根目錄中的 Web.config 中啟用它。To set the transmission of cookies using SSL for an entire application, enable it in the application's configuration file, Web.config, which resides in the root directory of the application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[httpCookies 元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/74790718-bfa3-4935-bc9a-59c88797e08f)。For more information, see [httpCookies Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/74790718-bfa3-4935-bc9a-59c88797e08f). 設定值，以程式設計方式使用屬性覆寫在 Web.config 檔案中設定的值。Values set programmatically using the property override values set in the Web.config file. 當處理機密資訊，強烈建議使用 SSL 加密，使用 HTTPS 通訊協定。When dealing with sensitive information, it is strongly recommended that you use HTTPS protocol with SSL encryption. SSL 可防止要改變的資料 （資料完整性）、 保護使用者的身分識別 （機密性），並確保資料是來自預期的用戶端 （驗證）。SSL protects against data being altered (data integrity), protects a user's identity (confidentiality), and assures that data originates from the expected client (authentication). 如需優點加密的詳細資訊，請參閱[密碼編譯服務](~/docs/standard/security/cryptographic-services.md)。For more information on the benefits of encryption, see [Cryptographic Services](~/docs/standard/security/cryptographic-services.md). 如需有關如何在網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) Web 伺服器上設定 SSL 的詳細資訊，請參閱[Web 伺服器或網站上設定 SSL](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=38553)。For more information about configuring SSL on an Internet Information Services (IIS) Web server, see [Configuring SSL on a Web Server or a Web Site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=38553). ## Examples 如果 cookie 設定為傳輸使用 SSL，所以下列程式碼範例會採取動作。The following code example takes action if the cookie is set to transmit using SSL. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookie.Secure Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.Secure Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookie.Secure Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.Secure Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Shareable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 判斷 cookie 是否可以參與輸出快取。

span.span: Determines whether the cookie is allowed to participate in output caching.

value.span: 若要指定包含一個或多個輸出 Cookie 的特定 不會隱藏輸出快取則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: to specify that output caching will not be suppressed for a give containing one or more outbound cookies; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果給定包含一或多個傳出 cookie設`false`（預設值），輸出將會隱藏回應的快取。If a given contains one or more outbound cookies with is set to `false` (the default value), output caching will be suppressed for the response. 這可避免包含潛在的敏感資訊從回應中快取，並傳送至多個用戶端的 cookie。This prevents cookies that contain potentially sensitive information from being cached in the response and sent to multiple clients. 若要允許含有 cookie 快取的回應，請設定 快取正常回應，例如使用`OutputCache`指示詞或 MVC 的 [OutputCache] 屬性，並設定所有的傳出 cookie 具有設`true`。To allow a response containing cookies to be cached, configure caching normally for the response, such as using the `OutputCache` directive or MVC's [OutputCache] attribute, and set all outbound cookies to have set to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool TryParse (string input, out System.Web.HttpCookie result);

param.span: 方法會覆寫此參數的值，一旦輸入方法，參數會立即以傳址方式傳遞，且設定為 Null。

span.span: This parameter's value is overwritten by the method; the parameter is passed by reference and set to null as soon as the method is entered.

summary.span: 將 Cookie 的指定字串表示，轉換為其相等的 ，並傳回一個值指出轉換是否成功。

returns.span: 如果 轉換成功，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if was converted successfully; otherwise, .

A collection of cookie values.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立新的 cookie，並將數個值。The following code example creates a new cookie and adds several values to it. 如需如何從一個 cookie 擷取多個值的範例，請參閱。For an example of how to extract multiple values from one cookie, see . [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookie.Values Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.Values Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookie.Values Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.Values Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
